welcomeSteps.title: Hello! I'm the Knowledge Guardian.
welcomeSteps.text: Welcome to Arbor. We believe knowledge is a right, not a privilege. Here, every lesson you learn is a seed that helps this forest of wisdom grow for everyone.

welcomeSteps.title: Explore like a Map
welcomeSteps.text: Navigation is simple. Drag the map to move around, and click on the circles to expand topics and reveal new lessons.

welcomeSteps.title: Collect your Seeds
welcomeSteps.text: As you complete modules, you'll collect unique Seeds for your personal backpack. Your garden will grow with every lesson you master!

welcomeSteps.title: Activate my Superintelligence (AI)
welcomeSteps.text: By default, I guide you using the lesson text. You can upgrade my brain by connecting a Cloud AI (like Gemini) or a Local AI (Ollama/WebLLM) for privacy.

welcomeSteps.title: Your Data is Private (Offline)
welcomeSteps.text: Important: Your progress lives 100% in this browser. To save it or move it to another device, go to your Profile and Export your backpack file.

aiPitchSub: Click the Owl icon ü¶â to configure AI.
missionText: Arbor is a decentralized educational platform built by the community. Its goal is to democratize access to information by allowing anyone to learn, contribute, and improve the global curriculum in a transparent and collaborative way. Education is a human right, not a business.
metaphorText: Like a tree, knowledge grows organically thanks to everyone's contributions (the roots) to provide fruit for anyone who needs it (the leaves).
impressumText: Arbor‚Ñ¢ is a product of Treesys¬Æ. All content is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. Arbor is not an accredited educational institution.

sourceManagerDesc: Share or add complete courses and external trees. Arbor will detect the name automatically.
sourceSwitchSuccess: Switched to a new knowledge universe
sourceWarning: You are using a third-party knowledge source. Content is the responsibility of its publisher.
secWarningBody: You are about to add an external knowledge tree that has NOT been verified by the Arbor team. Anyone can clone a repository and impersonate an official institution.
secWarningCheck: Please verify that the URL comes from a trusted source:
noSourcesFound: No trees found with that name.
exitWarningText: You have an evaluation in progress. If you leave, your current progress will be lost.
exportDesc: Choose what you want to download.
emptyModuleDesc: There are no lessons here yet.
contribDesc: Help us grow the garden. Connect your GitHub account to enable the "Edit" button on lessons and submit improvements to the team.
contribNote: Note: You need a Personal Access Token (Classic) with "repo" permissions.
contribTokenError: Invalid or expired token. Please click the link to generate a new one.
prSuccessBody: A Pull Request has been created successfully. The community will review your contribution.
profileDesc: Customize your appearance and manage your progress.
exportDesc_Profile: Download a file to save your progress.
importDesc: Upload a file to restore progress.
googleSyncDesc: Optional: Sign in to sync automatically across devices.
